title: fucking nerf morgana snare
body: Really riot? nerf that shit its way too long

replies.body: Play DotA 2 and then come back and complain about how Morgana snares are too long. The CC in that game puts the CC in this game to shame.
you think dota 2 is bad, go back to world war 2, the snares you get there are there for life

O_o morg's snares aren't even the worst snares in the game... lux's are significantly easier to land as are zyra's, nami's bubble is a knock-up that can only be cleanse flashed, taric stun is targetted, blitz hook is a displacement and has a larger hitbox, leo e can't be minion blocked... there's so many stronger types of cc that supports bring over morg's cc. buy a banshees, get a mikaels, improve your movespeed and learn to dodge.
